panels.title: Pool - Request Rate by Duration Buckets (Aggregated)
Edelivery - Request Rate by Duration Buckets (Aggregated)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (method, route) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum[5m])) / (sum by (method, route) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count[5m])) > 0) or vector(0))
sum by (method, route) (rate(http_requests_total{status_code=~"[45].."}[5m])) / sum by (method, route) (rate(http_requests_total[5m]))
